data.text: @echo_chamberz Spend your tourism dollars in places that are fully open and not implementing authoritarian practices. You already see that domestically in the US with Florida hitting record tourism. Countries now with zero entry requirements: Iceland, Norway, Mexico, Costa Rica, Dominican, etc
